long_description: The rugged Petzl Djinn Bent Gate Carabiner is a great choice for the rope end of a quickdraw. It's built tough to endure frequent use at the climbing crag. H-shaped profile offers a great strength-to-weight ratio. Wide rope-bearing surfaces are designed to promote rope glide and reduce wear on the 'biner. Key lock nose won't snag on pro, ropes or slings, making the 'biner simple to clip. Bent gate makes it easy to clip the rope while you're lead climbing.
short_description: The rugged Petzl Djinn Bent Gate Carabiner is a great choice for the rope end of a quickdraw. It's built tough to endure frequent use at the climbing crag.
